Plots a legend that can be used for explore_all with a binary target

Source: R/tools.R
plot_legend_targetpct.Rd

Plots a legend that can be used for explore_all with a binary target

Usage

plot_legend_targetpct(border = TRUE)

Arguments

border

Draw a border?

Value

Base plot

Examples

plot_legend_targetpct(border = TRUE)
